translations.chinese: 又彊殺秦降王子嬰，罪五也。
translations.english: He also forcibly killed the Qin surrender prince Zi Ying. This is crime five.

translations.chinese: 詐阬秦子弟新安二十萬，王其將，罪六也。
translations.english: He deceitfully massacred 200,000 Qin youths at Xin'an and made himself their king. This is crime six.

translations.chinese: 皆王諸將善地，而徙逐故主，令臣下爭畔逆，罪七也。
translations.english: He enfeoffed the various generals with good territories but banished and drove out the former lords, causing ministers and subordinates to contend in rebellion. This is crime seven.

translations.chinese: 出逐義帝彭城，自都之，奪韓 王地，并王梁楚，多自與，罪八也。
translations.english: He drove out Righteous Emperor from Pengcheng, established his own capital there, seized the lands of the King of Han, and united the kingships of Liang and Chu, taking most for himself. This is crime eight.

translations.chinese: 使人陰殺義帝江南，罪九也。
translations.english: He sent people to secretly kill Righteous Emperor south of the Jiang. This is crime nine.
